name: Breaking News (OfeX, yuvalbeck, ElonF)
description:
Attention all you brave folks out there! This game isn't for the faint of heart - it takes two to tango if you want to capture the news! You and your partner will have to work together to navigate treacherous terrain and hostile environments to capture the news that people need to hear. Are you ready for the challenge? Then let's get out there and report the news!

Credits:

Art - Ofek Mizrahi, Yuval Beck

Code -  Elon Fraichard, Iddo Ziv, Yair Maryles
